abstract: China says it will cut import taxes on clothing, cosmetics and some other goods by half as a new tactic to generate more consumer spending and economic growth.
lead_paragraph: China announced Monday that it would cut import taxes on clothing, cosmetics and some other goods by half as a new tactic to generate more consumer spending and economic growth.

headline.main: China to Reduce Import Taxes to Spur Spending and Growth
headline.print_headline: China to Reduce Import Taxes to Spur Spending and Growth

snippet: China announced Monday that it would cut import taxes on clothing, cosmetics and some other goods by half as a new tactic to generate more consumer spending and economic growth.
